channel.title: Twitch Extension exe/death voting
channel.description: It would be totally killer to implement the exe/death voting that dead players get to do, ideally for real ingame gold , as a twitch extension :) giving people a reward for watching will bring more viewers, which will reward streamers. I wouldn't mind if a share of the gold I earned for good predictions went to the streamer as a direct reward as well. Totally agree they are super influential on this awesome game.

item.title: Twitch Extension exe/death voting
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
I like this idea.

Not only it makes it interactive, it also attract more ppl to ToL <3

Read full topic
